item.description:
Who's up for some live music and dancing? We had so much fun last time.

Spike the Punch, a Boston cover band, at the Scoreboard in Woburn.

Let's meet at 7:30. Band starts at 9:00.

Also, you can watch the Red Sox play the White Sox from Chicago on the many HD TVs at Scoreboard!

No cover charge

www.spikethepunch.com

I'll put a red ballon on the back of my chair. I'll try to reserve seats.

I'm also cross posting this with the "North Shore Women's" and the "North Shore Separated and Divorced" Meetup groups.

I'll email my phone # to attendees on Sat Morning.
item.name: Spike the Punch & Watch Sox vs White Sox at Scoreboard Woburn Sat 4/28/12 7:30PM
